snippet: A proposal by the Obama administration to overhaul the $1.4 billion international program has sparked a jurisdictional fight that threatens to derail the plan.
abstract: Proposal by Obama administration to overhaul $1.4 billion international food aid program sparks jurisdictional fight among members of several House and Senate committees that threatens to derail plan.
lead_paragraph: A proposal by the Obama administration to overhaul the $1.4 billion international program has sparked a jurisdictional fight that threatens to derail the plan.

headline.seo: Food Aid Proposal Sets Off Infighting in Congress
headline.main: Proposal for Changes in Food Aid Sets Off Infighting in Congress
headline.print_headline: Proposal for Changes in Food Aid Sets Off Infighting in Congress

keywords.value: United States Agency for International Development
